00029 class DnsSdService : public CommonServiceValues
00030 {
00031 public:
00032     DnsSdService();
00033     DnsSdService( const DnsSdService& ToCopy );
00034     DnsSdService( const DnsSdService* ToCopy );
00035     DnsSdService( const SimpleString FullName, uint16_t ePort, const SimpleString HostName = SimpleString::EmptyString );
00036     DnsSdService( const SimpleString ServiceName, const SimpleString RegType, const SimpleString Domain, uint16_t ePort, const SimpleString HostName = SimpleString::EmptyString );
00037     DnsSdService( const SimpleString ServiceName, const SimpleString Protocol, CommonServiceValues::TransportProtocol Transport, const SimpleString Domain, uint16_t ePort, const SimpleString HostName = SimpleString::EmptyString );
00038 
00039     // Virtual destructor always
00040     virtual ~DnsSdService();
00041 
00042     SimpleString CompleteServiceName; //[ServiceNameLength];    // Complete service Name
00043     SimpleString RegisteredName;
00044     ServiceProperties Properties;
00045 
00046     static bool CheckProtocol( const SimpleString RegisterType );
00047     static bool CheckName( const SimpleString Name );
00048 
00049 public:
00050     // Static fonction to process data from DNS-SD
00051     static SimpleString GetDNSSDServiceNameFromFullName( const SimpleString Name );
00052 
00053 protected:
00054     void Empty();
00055     void Init();
00056     void Init( const SimpleString eFullName, uint16_t ePort, const SimpleString eHostName = SimpleString::EmptyString );
00057 
00058 
00059 public:
00060     SimpleString Name;                                          // Name of the service (63 bytes + '\0')
00061     SimpleString Protocol;                                      // type of service (63 bytes + '\0')
00062     SimpleString Transport;                                     // transport protocol ("tcp" or "_udp")
00063     TransportProtocol nTransport;                       // numerical value for transport protocol
00064     SimpleString Domain;                                        //[DNSServiceMaxDomainName];                    // DNS domain name
00065 
00066     uint16_t Port;                                                      // On which port the service is running
00067     SimpleString HostName;                                      // On which host the service is running
00068 
00069     SimpleString ToString();                            // print a human readable description of service
00070 };
